title: Eternal Curse
description: With a heavy heart, Montana and Callie must try to move on and face the dark futures which await them.While Callie struggles with the binds of the slayer's vow, Montana faces a wedding which will deliver her into the hands of the vampire royals forever.As the murders escalate in New York City, it seems Montana is their next target. And as Callie races there to rescue her, she finds herself in the hands of the gods...Can Callie make it to New York before all hope is lost? And will Montana be able to tear herself away from her fiancee before the wedding, even though she's captivated by him?Book 3 in the Age of Vampires Sage is an upper YA dystopian paranormal romance with heart-pounding action and breath-taking twists and turns.
author: Caroline Peckham
